title: Music & Sound
description: A selection of music composing, production, and sound design projects. Both personal and commissioned projects.

items.title: Spacebarman
items.description: My main music project. I compose, record and produce all the music for Spacebarman. I have released an album and several EPs. It has recently become a live band with a little help of my colleagues Mauricio Belalcázar (drums) and Daniel Rosero (bass).

items.title: Unfulfilled
items.description: A collection of short songs, b-sides and rejected soundtrack pieces.

items.title: El Fin de una Dictadura (Dead Dictatorship)
items.description: A short zombie film directed by Alex Quezada. In the director's words, 'a reflection about unpunished events of recent Colombian history'.

items.title: MixPerceptions
items.description: An Augmented-Reality art installation in which users interact with artworks with their smartphone or tablets and headphones. I created the soundtrack, sound design and programmed the audio interaction using Puredata. Finalist in the Siggraph 2014 AR contest

items.title: Mi Amigo Picú (My Friend Picú)
items.description: I designed the sound and co-composed the music (along with Daniela Torres) for this short film for children

items.title: Dunas (Dunes)
items.description: A surreal short film directed by Alex Quezada. I created the sound effects and composed the soundtrack

items.title: La Fábrica (a.k.a. Fabricamusic)
items.description: A pioneer electronic rock band from Cali, Colombia. I co-composed and produced most of the music between 2000 and 2010. The linked Bandcamp site includes a selection of works.

items.title: Yo soy otro (Others)
items.description: A fantasy film by Colombian director Oscar Campo. I composed most of the original soundtrack (while working with La Fábrica).

items.title: Los Ciclos (Cycles)
items.description: A short film directed by Juan Manuel Acuña. I designed the sound effects for the short. Original score composed by Alejandro Ramírez Rojas
